name.Description: SKU Name of the promotion to activate

displayName.Description: Friendly name for user to easily identified the promotion.

appliedScopes.Description: List of subscriptions getting the benefit of the promotion.

orderId.Description: Unique Id for the promotion order.

effectiveDateTime.Description: This is the DateTime when the promotion would come in effect

lastUpdatedDateTime.Description: Last update time of the promotion resource.

expiryDate.Description: This is the date when the Reservation will expire.
